mapper.insert: insert into chat_group_member (group_id, opay_id, `name`, img, is_mute, is_block, join_time) values (#{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{opayId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{isMute,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{isBlock,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, #{joinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP})

group_id,

mapper.update:
update chat_group_member
group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
opay_id = #{opayId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_mute = #{isMute,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
is_block = #{isBlock,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
join_time = #{joinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update chat_group_member
group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
opay_id = #{opayId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
`name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
is_mute = #{isMute,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
is_block = #{isBlock,jdbcType=BOOLEAN},
join_time = #{joinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
where opay_id = #{opayId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and group_id=#{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update chat_group_member set group_id = #{groupId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, opay_id = #{opayId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, `name` = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, img = #{img,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, is_mute = #{isMute,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, is_block = #{isBlock,jdbcType=BOOLEAN}, join_time = #{joinTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP} where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select count(id) from chat_group_member where group_id=#{groupId}
select from chat_group_member where group_id=#{groupId} and opay_id!=#{opayId} order by join_time desc limit 1;
mapper.delete: delete from chat_group_member where opay_id = #{opayId,jdbcType=BIGINT} and group_id=#{groupId}
